705650f-a.folder: McDonald Avenue & Village Road North, Brooklyn, NY
705650f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: McDonald Avenue - Village Road North
705650f-a.text:
2286-2290 McDonald Ave., at the S.W. corner of Village Road North, showing the B.M.T. Culver Elevated Lines overhead. Also seen is Village Road North, south side, west from McDonald Ave.
April 21, 1931.
P.L. Sperr.

705651f-a.folder: McDonald Avenue & Village Road North, Brooklyn, NY
705651f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: McDonald Avenue - Village Road North
705651f-a.text:
2307 McDonald Ave., east side, between Village Road North and Neck Road, showing an old cobbler's shop.
March 2, 1931.
P.L. Sperr.

707220f-a.folder: Village Rd. N. & McDonald Ave., Brooklyn, NY
707220f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Village Rd. N. - McDonald Ave.
707220f-a.text:
(1)
61-73 Village Road North, east from Mc Donald Ave., to Village Road East. Mc Donald Ave., is in the background, with its B.M.T Colver
Lines overhead; and No. 73 is in the foreground.
March 2, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a close-up of No. 73.
March 2, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

707220f-b.original_title: Brooklyn: Village Rd. N. - McDonald Ave.
707220f-b.text:
(1)

(2)

707221f-a.folder: Village Rd. N. & McDonald Ave., Brooklyn, NY
707221f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Village Rd. N. - McDonald Ave.
707221f-a.text:
(1) Village Road North, north side, between McDonald Ave., and Village Road East, showing the Williamson house which was erected in 1780. This house is 50 feet distant from the former house which was erected in 1665. This land upon which the house is situated, is said to have been a grant made by Queen Ann to this family in 1665. This house was demolished in 1929.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2)
The same, a view west. The Culver Elevated Line of the B.M.T. is seen in the background on McDonald Ave.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(3)
The same, another view.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(4)
The same, a view east. The building at the right is No. 76 Village Road.
February 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

707223f-a.folder: Village Rd. N. & McDonald Ave., Brooklyn, NY
707223f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Village Rd. N. - McDonald Ave.
707223f-a.text:
(1)
Village Road North (rear view), north side, between McDonald Ave. (right), and Village Road East (left), showing in the foreground a barn, once used by one "Emmons" as a slaughter house.
March 2, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing, another view of the former slaughter house now used by the Gravesend Village Nursery.
March 2, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
